content: With the Guanyin's Willow Leaf Soak equipped, all Gourd uses will be recovered upon resurrection within a battle.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Guanyin's_Willow_Leaf.md', within the main section titled 'Guanyin's Willow Leaf'.
The content is as follows:
With the Guanyin's Willow Leaf Soak equipped, all Gourd uses will be recovered upon resurrection within a battle.
